Player History
Drafted in 11th round, 175th overall pick, by Atlanta in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/2/2015, off Clark Staggs (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2015, off Benjamin Berg (PHI)...
Injured on 6/22/2015 with a Broken Hand, out for 5 weeks...
10/5/2015: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $5,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
Injured on 5/26/2017 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/10/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $1,300,000 per year...
Injured on 6/22/2018 with a Torn Calf Muscle, out for 9 weeks...
